wikipedia_page.main: Michael Roderick Oliver, born September 1938,  is an English businessman, philanthropist and chairman of four Cheshire based companies – Oliver Valves, Oliver Valvetek, Oliver Twinsafe and Oliver Hydcovalves– which manufacture high-pressure valves for the oil and gas sector.

response: *Michael Roderick Oliver, D.L., Chairman, Oliver Valves. For services to the Valve Industry.
